verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedars,<s%> but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> remaineth <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

Then <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in thine <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.
And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> to dwell in: <S%H3427><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> but have <S%H1961>gone<s%> from <S%H4480>tent<s%> <S%H168><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and from one <S%H4480>tabernacle<s%> <S%H4908><s%> to another.

Wheresoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> I a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedars?<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H3541>thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> thee <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5116>sheepcote,<s%> even <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> that thou shouldest <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee <S%H3605>whithersoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast <S%H1980>walked,<s%> and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> thee a <S%H8034>name<s%> like the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the great <S%H1419>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Also I will <S%H7760>ordain<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them, and they shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H8478>place,<s%> and shall be <S%H7264>moved<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H1086>waste<s%> them any <S%H3254>more,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> at the <S%H7223>beginning,<s%>

And since the <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Moreover I will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Furthermore I <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> thee a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4390>expired<s%> that thou must <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of thy <S%H4480>sons;<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H1121>son:<s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> take my mercy <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H2617><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him, <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H5493>took<s%> it from him <S%H4480>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee:

But I will <S%H5975>settle<s%> him in mine <S%H1004>house<s%> and in my <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5704>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2377>vision,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> did <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> am <S%H589>I,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4310>what<s%> is mine <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H5704>hitherto?<s%> <S%H1988><s%>

And yet <S%H2063>this<s%> was a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> for thou hast also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H4480>come,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> and hast <S%H7200>regarded<s%> me according to the <S%H8448>estate<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> of high <S%H4609>degree,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> can <S%H1732>David<s%> speak <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee for the <S%H3519>honor<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant?<s%> for <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for thy servant's <S%H5668>sake,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> and according to thine own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> in making <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these great <S%H1420>things.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like <S%H3644>thee,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> thee, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> to be his own <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> thee a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1420>greatness<s%> and <S%H3372>terribleness,<s%> by driving <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt?<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

For <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> didst thou <S%H5414>make<s%> thine own <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5704>forever;<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1961>becamest<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> let the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Let it even be <S%H539>established,<s%> that thy <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even a <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> hast <S%H1540>told<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H241><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> that thou wilt <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H4672>found<s%> in his heart to <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H430>God,<s%> and hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>goodness<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> thy servant: <S%H5650><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let it <S%H2974>please<s%> thee to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H5769>forever:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1288>blessest,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and it shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
